alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 8:21AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, southeastern West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, southwestern St. Helena, southeastern Pointe Coupee, northwestern Livingston, central East Feliciana, Iberville and East Baton Rouge Parishes through 845 AM CDT... At 820 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Roads to Addis to 6 miles east of Lake Fausse Pointe. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Slaughter, Rosedale, Wilson and Norwood. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 141 and 171. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana; Western Ascension
